name: Hidden Deep
summary: Control members of your team: explore, climb, swim, scan, blast, shoot and more to accomplish dangerous missions in a huge suboceanic mining and research facility. Hidden Deep is an atmospheric sci-fi action thriller, heavily inspired by Aliens, The Thing, and Half-Life.
info:
• 发行: Daedalic Entertainment
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: 2D横板惊悚

  • 发行日期: IN 2021
  • 开发: Cogwheel Software
